# Copilot Instructions for Cozyclinic Website

## Project Overview
Professional medical clinic website for cozyclinic.com.vn - a modern healthcare facility website built with vanilla HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

## Project Structure
- `index.html` - Main homepage with all sections
- `assets/css/styles.css` - Complete stylesheet with responsive design
- `assets/js/main.js` - Interactive functionality and form handling
- `assets/images/` - Placeholder directory for images and icons
- `README.md` - Comprehensive project documentation

## Key Features Implemented
✅ Responsive homepage with hero section
✅ Services showcase with 6 medical specialties
✅ Doctor profiles section
✅ Interactive appointment booking form
✅ Contact section with embedded map
✅ Mobile-responsive navigation
✅ Form validation and user feedback
✅ Smooth scrolling and animations
✅ Professional medical color scheme
✅ SEO-optimized structure

## Technologies Used
- HTML5 (semantic structure)
- CSS3 (Grid, Flexbox, animations)
- JavaScript (ES6+, form handling)
- Google Fonts (Inter typography)
- Responsive design principles

## Development Guidelines
- Maintain semantic HTML for accessibility
- Follow medical industry design standards
- Ensure WCAG accessibility compliance
- Test across all device sizes
- Optimize for local SEO and healthcare searches
- Keep professional, trustworthy appearance
